com.amazonaws.greengrass.javasdk

Class GreengrassClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.greengrass.javasdk.GreengrassClientBuilder

  • public final class GreengrassClientBuilder
extends Object
    AWS Greengrass client builder to build Greengrass clients. There are following options available: 1. IotData Client 2. Lambda Client 3. SecretManager Client 4. StreamManager Client

    e.g IotDataClient iotdata = GreengrassClientBuilder.iotDataClient().build(); LambdaClient lambda = GreengrassClientBuilder.lambdaClient().build(); StreamManagerClient streamManager = GreengrassClientBuilder.streamManagerClient().build();

    Use of the builder is preferred over using constructors of the client class.
